text:
Thanks Jim for the perfectly curated session for us! We were initially afraid that we'll bring his "passing rate" of 95% down, but now we know why even first timers can do well on their first try!

Jim is a great coach especially for us beginners, giving cues and feedback for us to feel confident on the board. We really enjoyed ourselves and felt confident to try new things with his guidance.

Having Lexi with us on the boat was a great plus ðŸ™ŒðŸ’¯

It was an exceptional experience for my son, Kai who was trying wakeboarding for the 1st time. (Jim) Your superb coaching made a significant impact during the entire session. Your clear and understandable approach to teaching, which greatly helped Kai to grasp the basics of wakeboarding and stand on the board with confidence by the end of the session. This session was not only a valuable learning experience for Kai but also an important lesson in understanding the key aspects of life.
Your well-stated observation, " It highlighted that every endeavour begins with a positive mindset. When one approaches a challenge with a well-structured and optimistic attitude, the results are bound to be favourable,"  resonates deeply and is undoubtedly true.
Highly recommend your coaching to anyone interested in wakeboarding and confidently award in a five star rating.

Highly recommended! I booked a two-hour wakeboarding session with Jim for my wifeâ€™s birthday (Iâ€™m a first-timer and sheâ€™s a beginner) and we had a fun and educational time. Jim was friendly and encouraging, and great with giving clear, structured and easy-to-understand tips and theory behind wakeboarding techniques. It being my first time, I felt assured that he was very experienced and knowledgeable, and mindful of safety. I could feel his passion for not just the sport, but teaching as well! 5/5 stars! Thanks Jim!
Jim was great on the water. Fun time, safe, and efficient on the water. Extremely easy communication on WhatsApp. Thanks!

I had the pleasure of taking a lesson with Jim, and I can't recommend him enough! He's an incredible instructorâ€”patient, attentive, and highly skilled. Jim has a remarkable ability to spot even the smallest mistakes and provides clear, constructive guidance to help you improve. His teaching style is both encouraging and practical, making it easy to understand and apply the feedback. Whether you're a beginner or looking to refine your technique, Jim's positive attitude and expert advice will make you feel confident and motivated. If youâ€™re looking to learn or level up your wakeboarding/wakesurfing, Jim is the instructor you want!
